review: I love my Fire stick, lots of great prime programs to choose from.
author: Peggy F.

review: I am so sad that I have to give this product a one star. We've had this a little over a month now and have to return it. Amazon prime tv works great but Netflix and Hulu have completely stopped working on it. We are hoping that we have better luck with the Roku stick next!
author: Elaine

review: I was really confused by all the different types out there I finally settled for the Fire Stick and I'm so glad I did.  Very easy to use right out of the box. So many choices I am seriously considering having cable shut off.
author: Annabel "DMT"

review: Simple, great flexibility, (different resolutions 720P 1080P etc.) intuitive Interface, a real no Brainer to get up and running and enjoy
author: Charles J. Di Perri

review: Easy to use, the kids love it...It loads the games extremely fast.
author: K. S.

review: Pretty neat little stick. Not as fast as the Apple TV I also own but it definitely does what it says it does.
author: Josh Euerle

review: We bought 1 for us, and 1 for SIL, we both LOVE it.
author: JoAnn
